    The Sift Difference

    Own the risk-reward equation with Sift’s scalable, AI-powered decisioning platform and on-demand expertise. Eliminate digital pain points through deep, user-level insights, and secure measurable growth with our immense data consortium covering a global spectrum of markets and merchants.

    The Only Independent Leader in AI-led Risk Decisioning

    The Sift Platform

    Join Sift’s legacy of leadership in AI-driven, enterprise-grade risk decisioning. Precise, user-level signals throughout the user journey turn fraud challenges into a roadmap for secure, scalable growth.

    Platform Overview
    1

    Redefine Risk Operations

    Growth gets faster with every signal, narrowing the gap between security and profitability.

    2

    Outpace Competitors

    Innovation = expectation with data and AI-fueled decisioning built on 12+ years of tuning.

    3

    Connect with Confidence

    Stack-critical integrations refine operations by tethering mixed data directly to outcomes.

    Risk Decisioning Pain Points, Solved

    Challenges reveal opportunities for growth with AI-fueled detection and analysis. Break into bigger and brand new markets confidently, face fraud hurdles head on, and secure every stage of the user journey.

    Make users untouchable with bulletproof account protection.

    Sift Account Defense easily handles bot-based account attacks at scale, and instantly identifies ATO at login with:

    • AI-fueled agility and adaptability
    • Accelerated decisioning and advanced APIs
